 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּקֻּעֹת‎</span> **noun [feminine] plural** ==gourds== (***wild cucumbers, citrullus colocynthis***, with purgative properties, according to [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Hastings DB ii. 250</sup> [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Ri HWB 278 f.</sup> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">κολοκυνθις</span>; &gt; ***momordica*** (or ***ecballium***) ***elaterium***, which is not a ***vine***; compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, fruit of ***colocynthis*** (or the similar ***cucumis prophetarum***, [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>l.c.</sup> [[BDB#Brock|Brock]]); — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂדֶה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.39|2Kgs 4:39]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּר‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרר‎</span>.
